title: Update color theme to black and white and improve code experiment formatting

requirements.text: Update the entire UI color scheme to a black and white palette, replacing the current color system with a monochromatic theme using shades of black, white, and gray while maintaining good contrast and readability

quotes: Change the colour theme to black and white maybe look good

acceptanceCriteria: All UI elements use only black, white, and grayscale colors
Text remains readable with sufficient contrast ratios
Interactive elements have clear hover and active states using grayscale variants
Background gradients and decorative elements use only black/white/gray tones

requirements.text: Improve the code formatting and alignment within the C++ experiment displays to ensure proper indentation, consistent spacing, and clean presentation of the code blocks

quotes: align the cod3s perfectly in that webpage

acceptanceCriteria: Code blocks display with proper monospace font
Indentation is preserved and visually consistent
Code is properly aligned within the card boundaries
Syntax structure is clearly visible and readable

requirements.text: Ensure the code experiments are fully copyable by implementing proper text selection and copy functionality that preserves code formatting and indentation when copied to clipboard
acceptanceCriteria: Users can select text within code blocks
Copy button preserves original code formatting including whitespace and indentation
Manual text selection and copy (Ctrl+C) works correctly
Copied code can be pasted into code editors with formatting intact

requirements.text: Reduce or remove excessive descriptive text, labels, or commentary around the code experiments, keeping only essential identifiers like the experiment titles

quotes: dont mention to much stuffs from your side

acceptanceCriteria: Only experiment titles ('1st - Experiment', '2nd - Experiment') are shown as headers
No additional descriptive text or explanations appear around the code
Code content is the primary focus of each card

constraints: Do not modify the password gate functionality or authentication logic
Preserve the existing developer profile section and its content
Maintain the responsive design and mobile compatibility
Keep the 'Bittu Kadai' branding and header unchanged
nonGoals: Adding new code experiments beyond the existing two
Modifying the password or lockout mechanism
Changing the developer profile information or Instagram link
Adding syntax highlighting or code editor features
